Reviews.Title: Great price for cables
Reviews.Author: Keyser Soze
Reviews.Content: Cables are great for the price. A couple of important notes:#1 Be sure to take your time to stretch it all out, or you'll be spending/wasting some time untangling it#2 Take note of the end (power cable) before pulling through conduit/crawl space/in-wall/in-ceiling. You don't want to go through all the motions of fishing the cable through walls/ceilings only to find out that you have the wrong end.

Reviews.Title: Not good at all
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: I bought this 4 pack because the price was right & their were plenty of stellar 5-star reviews...I purchased a CIB All-In-One Security system about a year ago (see my reviews) which came with cables which were thin, but OK. So I expected something similar when I bought these cables. When they arrived, I was a bit disappointed that they were thinner than the free cables I got with my CIB System. To give you an idea, these cables are thinner than the cable on my cheap computer mouse. But I figured they would be OK since the reviews were so good & that they would be easy to hide since they are so thin.Before I even unwound the cables, I plugged in a camera & power to each one to test them. The 1st cable had excessive static/interference, the 2nd cable had good video but the power did not work, the 3rd cable had no video, but the power worked & the 4th cable worked OK. I even tried each cable again with a different camera & power adapter to be sure the cables were the problem since I could not believe 3 out of 4 were bad.With 3 out of 4 cables being bad, I am just returning them & will look for something else. I would not buy these cables again even if they cost half of what I paid. The only positive thing I can say is that these cables came with 8 BNC Female to RCA Male adapters.

Reviews.Title: Good cable
Reviews.Author: Phil Monson
Reviews.Content: For the price, and the quality, a good deal, been installed for awhile now, have not had any problems at all

Reviews.Title: Does exactly what it supposed to do, but wires wrapped in an absurd fashion
Reviews.Author: Jared
Reviews.Content: These wires worked exactly as they were supposed to with no defects found during my installation.However, the way the wires were wrapped was crazy. They immediately become a rat's nest of knots when you begin to unravel them. I found this out too late: while in the attic. It added at least 30 or more minutes to my install and made for lots of frustration. Partially my fault for not doing this on the ground before hand, but still, why the heck would the packager wrap them in this way?Result: Does the job that you're probably looking to do, but make sure you spend the time unraveling them before you begin the install or you might go insane.

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive cables for my home security cameras.
Reviews.Author: Fireballsocal
Reviews.Content: These are installed on my swann 16 channel 8 camera home security camera system right alongside the standard cables that came with the set. I see no difference in picture quality between the 2. This is a perfectly acceptable cable set for not alot of money. The only difference I can see is that you really need to muscle the spring loaded ends on. Push hard, much harder then the standard swann cables and they will slide on, then you can twist them to lock. I would definitely recommend them as well as buy them again.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality: thin wire, minimal insulation, and bad connectors
Reviews.Author: a_reviewer
Reviews.Content: These cables use extremely small power conductors (probably around 22 or 24 AWG) over a very long run.  To give you an idea of the difference between these and higher-quality cables, the entire package of 4 cables takes up the same space as one 100' 75ohm Swann cable.  Accordingly, the cable has minimal insulation / protection and if you were to drag it across any sharp edges during installation, it may be the end of the cable.  The worst part is the connector quality.  The DC power connectors are supposed to be the somewhat standard 5.5mm x 2.1mm barrels; however, there was so much variation that some ends would fit snugly and others would virtually fall off.  Due to the poor tolerances, power to the cameras was intermittent and the ends had to be adjusted any time the cables were bumped.  Fortunately, I discovered this before running them, and hopefully you'll read this before buying them.  As indicated, the Swann are far better quality if you require a pre-made cable.  Otherwise, I'd recommend buying high-quality 75-ohm siamese cable, BNC connectors, and power pigtails and making your own cables to fit your install.

Reviews.Title: Its perfect.
Reviews.Author: J. CHITKARA "JC"
Reviews.Content: Installed and it recently  to add more cameras at my place.Works perfectly. No crimping, no hassles. Perfectly cut and tightly machine crimped.So no issues.Will work good for anyone who knows the length. Always calculate a little extra,

Reviews.Title: I didnt need but 1 cable
Reviews.Author: Jack strickland
Reviews.Content: When I ordered my camera system I wanted to make sure I had everything I needed to make it work . I only needed ! 100 ft cable but I have spares now if someone decides to cut one.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Whitney twist
Reviews.Content: This is exactly what i wanted. I did need to buy connections to connect two wires together because I needed more length but perfect!

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Mex "AJCR"
Reviews.Content: We were kind of worried the cables would not work for us, but for the price they work very good. I  would recommend the seller to my friends or other customers. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Work great
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: We have 4 cameras using these extension cables. It did its job, extend the distance of my cameras to my monitor/recorder. Quality seems quite good and the shipping was fast. A great value.

Reviews.Title: Love this item
Reviews.Author: Robert Mack
Reviews.Content: This item worked fine.  I needed to extend my security camera signal and the was just what I needed.  Great buy.Remack

Reviews.Title: Good Quality Product
Reviews.Author: William F. Raabe
Reviews.Content: I shopped and good the best price, and it came when promised. I'm happy with the quality of this product.

Reviews.Title: Works fine
Reviews.Author: DG
Reviews.Content: Not the highest quality cable, and it's not shielded, but it works just fine for it's purpose. Good product for the money.

Reviews.Title: excellent product at an exceptional price!
Reviews.Author: ejl3839
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this product because I believe in the brand and the quality. Trust me, it has definitely lived up to expectations and would do business again!

Reviews.Title: no problems
Reviews.Author: Greg Heffner
Reviews.Content: Cables worked fine, no issues on the connections. Quality was the same as the ones given with my system one

Reviews.Title: Does the Trick for a Decent Price
Reviews.Author: Michael Arellano
Reviews.Content: These definitely did the trick because the 60 ft. ones that came with the system were too short.  There are some bad reviews on here complaining about the thickness of the cable, but really what do you expect?  These are not the thick fire rated cables that would come with a $1500+ camera system.  These are going to be similar to the ones that would come with a $250 - $700 system.  Definitely a little thinner, but does the trick.

Reviews.Title: cheap, easily broken
Reviews.Author: Alf "Let the cat out of the bag!"
Reviews.Content: Beware!  The center pin in the coupler is copper coated plastic!  If you are not careful, the plastic pin breaks.

Reviews.Title: tangled mess
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I'd rather spend the time putting ends on bulk siamese cable than deal with these. Power wires are incredibly fragile, dont even try terminating them into a fused power supply. If you do manage to get them on the power supply, the video line connector is way too close to hook up to the DVR. These "cords" are wound by a sadist, if you need all 100ft, better take this outside and untangle it in your drive way before trying to route it. ends are junk, wire is junk, waste of time if you have any electrical experience. spend the little extra on a pull box, you'll save yourself hours of agony.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Norman Guith
Reviews.Content: The 60 foot cables that come with the cameras weren't long enough for my application.  The 100 ft. cables were easy to use and work flawlessly.

Reviews.Title: Not for HD
Reviews.Author: e-gadget-guy
Reviews.Content: I tried to use these for HD cameras and they didn't work. I wasted my money. Don't waste yours. Get something more robust.

Reviews.Title: Worked as promised!
Reviews.Author: Evilstalkerhorne
Reviews.Content: I have bought these several times as I do installations of camera systems. These cables are great quality and you can splice them etc and will work fine! I actually am running one for about 10 ft outside with no problems for about 2 years now and not a conduit pipe or anything. There is another run I did about 4in underground for about 25ft and this is 2 years old with no conduit. I sealed it well with seamless tape and heat wrap since I was splicing it to reach 200ft or so. I will buy again!

Reviews.Title: AS PROMISED
Reviews.Author: WAdam 15
Reviews.Content: Product was as described and delivered when promised.  Wires seem to be the same as those that came with the original cameras.  Seems like a good product.

Reviews.Title: Much needed cables
Reviews.Author: Gloria M. Williams
Reviews.Content: I had cameras installed by an electrician.  He did an excellent job.  The additional footage gave me flexibility with where I could install the cameras,

Reviews.Title: Cables are Cables
Reviews.Author: Darry T. Hayashi "DTin FL"
Reviews.Content: Cables are Cables can't beat the price. I replaced all the cameras and cables to my security system. All is working just great.

Reviews.Title: Met all my expectations and requirements as replacements Great Product as expected could not be happier will order again when ne
Reviews.Author: veterans cab
Reviews.Content: Met all my expectations and requirements as replacements Great Product as expected could not be happier will order again when needed  thank you

Reviews.Title: Camera extension cables
Reviews.Author: Edgar D.
Reviews.Content: Using 100ft cables allows us to easily expand our system. These cables hold up well in weather extremes. VideoSecure has provided us with a number of components - all good.

Reviews.Title: Work good, But
Reviews.Author: Annekeila Moon
Reviews.Content: Be sure to watch what you're doing when you unravel them - they get tangled Instantly if you don't pay close attention.Also, if you are using this for an extension cord - the connectors to need to plug into the original wires don't come with these and I had to make a run to Radio Shack in the middle of setting this up to get what I needed.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your time and money
Reviews.Author: Anthony Richmond
Reviews.Content: I bought these cables to put up four security cameras. I tested them before I ran them through my attic and they were a bit finicky especially with the connectors. However, I felt that once they were in place I would not have to mess with them. I ran the cables and two of them stopped working. I was so frustrated that I returned them (Amazon - 5 stars for ease of returns)  went ahead and invest in some quality cables. Climbing through my attic in Florida is no fun. Save yourself the headache and stay away from these cables.

Reviews.Title: Great cables
Reviews.Author: Richard Benjamin
Reviews.Content: Does the job perfectly. Video quality is good and made extended installations easy in my store. If I add more cameras, I will get more.

Reviews.Title: night owl cctv
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: For the price it does the job.  Easy to set up and install.  Good quality video.  Night vision capability is pretty good at 30 feet.

Reviews.Title: good replacement.
Reviews.Author: John Leonard "disneydriver"
Reviews.Content: purchased this to replace in 60 ft cables that came with my camera system. the kits should include at least a few 100ft lengths. so far they work fine with no problems . just use caution when installing to not cut into installation.

Reviews.Title: Good Product (When it Worked)
Reviews.Author: Shane Butler
Reviews.Content: 2 of the cables that came didnt work at all!!! I might have chalked it up to ok one doesnt work ill get a replacement but to have 2 in one 4 pack that is getting 50% of my order in not working order....very disappointed

Reviews.Title: Good quality
Reviews.Author: Bobby Joseph
Reviews.Content: This one came exactly as ordered and works just fine. No problems so far good clarity from the camera. Nice

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Robert DeLozier
Reviews.Content: It appears to be the same as the factory cable and they all worked just as well.  The price was a good value.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Ruso Minnifield "PrinceHappy2"
Reviews.Content: The Video Secu 4 Pack 100ft Video Power Cables Security Camera Extenstion wires cords was just what I wanted.  You get four chords at a good price and they all work great.  I recommend this product to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Quality cables at a reasonable price.
Reviews.Author: A. J. Kahler
Reviews.Content: Arrived quickly and just as described. Work with no problem with my Lorex camera's and give me the extra distance I needed for camera placement.

Reviews.Title: Its ok but a but flimsy.
Reviews.Author: AM "am amazon"
Reviews.Content: If its an "extension" cable, why don't they provide a female to female connector - which is essential !! Wasted gas and time trying to buy these connectors.

Reviews.Title: Needed accessory
Reviews.Author: James DeMichael
Reviews.Content: I have an exterior building and long runs. These were essential in the planning/execution of my install. These are not cheap as others stated. I'm a contractor and I was yanking on these pretty good as I went through my attic, basement & walls. PLAN your build to know if you'll need. These will not work if you wish to add mics.

Reviews.Title: Extension Surveillance Cables
Reviews.Author: Austin Haynes "Sinitron"
Reviews.Content: They work exactly as they're supposed to, didn't have a single problem hooking them to the camera I was using.

Reviews.Title: Works fine.
Reviews.Author: MrCaspers
Reviews.Content: The cords are really long and work as advertised.  I would use them again.My evertech cameras won't work at night using these cords.  I think it may be too far to supply enough power to the IR.

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: Daziegrl4
Reviews.Content: These cables work just as well as the ones that you pay much for. I will definitely work with this company again.

Reviews.Title: Great Wire
Reviews.Author: Casteela
Reviews.Content: This wire comes in 4 100ft packs with adapters that allows you to plug in to other sections of wire or directly to the unit your setting up. Good quality wire.

Reviews.Title: Run Cables Easily! No extra power line required.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: These are great cables for CCTV systems. The cables require a small hole and are smooth so pretty easy to snake through walls and ceilings. I was able to run 3 of these in a business in about 2 hours with minimal impact to the customers. The cable is also nice for when in-wall is just not an option, such as brick walls, stucco etc. It's very small so you can run the cable in the groutline between bricks, tiles, or stone and you can paint or grout right over it with no loss of signal. It disappears with a little ingenuity.

Reviews.Title: Good item, exactly as described.
Reviews.Author: No7JackDaniels
Reviews.Content: Not much to say about the item, it is what it is.  Package arrived via UPS right on schedule, haven't had time to use, but expect no problems, pretty simple.

Reviews.Title: Good but Bulky
Reviews.Author: Hicoteo
Reviews.Content: These are easy to plug in and seem to be good quality.However, Dear Manufacturer, please stagger the plug lengths so that the power plug is not right beside the video plug. For example, on one end of the wire make the power wire about four inches longer and on the other end make the video wire longer. This way cables can be joined without forming a huge ball that can’t pass through conducts.When joining two cables I had to cross and tape the plugs and still struggled to pass them through ¾ in. conduct with curves.I also think it would be nice if they came with a female-to-female coupler instead of or as well as the RCA adapter.

Reviews.Title: no problems
Reviews.Author: ryan
Reviews.Content: The only bad thing is it does not come with a connector that lets you add this to your existing wire. The connectors that come with it were worthless to me.

Reviews.Title: nice product.
Reviews.Author: Gerry
Reviews.Content: They are well constructed, much better than the ones comes with any security camera system with cables included. I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: G Henry
Reviews.Content: The cables function perfectly. The only problem was the way in which they were wound. It was difficult to unreel them without tangles.

Reviews.Title: Slightly thinner than original but good quality
Reviews.Author: L. Burdette
Reviews.Content: I purchased these when I bought the Swann system.  I should have bought more.  They are a little thinner than the original cords but still thick enough for use outside.  They work as directed and I'm glad I purchased them.  We ended up needing another long cord and tried to buy locally only to find NO place in my area sells them.  So, my recommendation, measure and make sure the size you need before buying.  The 150 ft lengths are not that much more in cost.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what was ordered
Reviews.Author: Karalynne McCarthy
Reviews.Content: This worked fine as extra cable for security camera system.  Arrived exactly as advertised. No problems with this product. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: quality
Reviews.Author: erik
Reviews.Content: The cords come in fast and the quality of the cables are good. I still have 4 laying around. Have to remember to pick up the female adapters.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Oscar Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: Happy with these, especially the price. Nice nice nice nice nice nice nice nice nice nice nice nice nice nice

Reviews.Title: cables
Reviews.Author: Adam Moore
Reviews.Content: these cables worked perfectly.  If you want extended reach then this is the product for you. c c c c

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: sherri
Reviews.Content: Good product and was of high quality.  The package came on time and was just what I needed.  The wiring also comes with the male female end adapters that is needed to contact two lines together.

Reviews.Title: Ran all four wires, work as expected
Reviews.Author: BP
Reviews.Content: What can I say, these are cables... they work, they do the job, have used all four and all images are clear.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Nova
Reviews.Content: Just what I neededYes I would recommend this productThey long enough to reach to all points I needed

Reviews.Title: yes sir
Reviews.Author: very good
Reviews.Content: works great perfect service , fast shipping , and just the way a was describe highly recommended , works super ,

Reviews.Title: Came in handy
Reviews.Author: gma
Reviews.Content: Needed all 4 glad I ordered them at the same time as cameras. We ordered an 8 camera system and our house is 2500 sq ft single story

Reviews.Title: They are cables
Reviews.Author: S. Hinds
Reviews.Content: Installed security system and all went well.  Tested the cables before installing and they worked great.  Installed and all worked as expected.

Reviews.Title: Within parameters
Reviews.Author: b scan
Reviews.Content: Within parameters. Work well. Nice product. This is how a product should be made and sold.  View tips and guidelines | 4 more words required.

Reviews.Title: Works perfect as advertised
Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: I bought these cables to meet the run length required. They are working great with my surveillance system. These cables are great for using both in doors and out doors. Quick and easy transaction.

Reviews.Title: no adapter
Reviews.Author: Thomas R. Kutcher
Reviews.Content: they didn't tell you there is no way of connecting it unless you get another adapterluckly radio shack etc. had themother than that it worked

Reviews.Title: WAY BETTER THAN LAST YEARS
Reviews.Author: Laron Taylor "laronvonbaron"
Reviews.Content: I bought the same model last year and was terribly disappointed see my review---BUT this unit is fantastic--the might vision LED's are a quantum leap better the interface is improved and I am very happy with my purchase this time--if you look at my review of this same unit last year it was HORRIBLE I am glad to see improvements were made in all areas I would feel ok giving my recommendation on this one

ProductInfo.Features:
100 feet video power cable
Plug and Play ready
All-in-one video and power cable
BNC video & 2.1mm power connectors
For DC power only
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 Pack 100ft Feet Video Power Cables Security Camera Extension Wires Cords with Free BNC RCA Connectors for CCTV DVR Home Surveillance System C18
